basics.label: Software Engineering Intern, uOttawa CS Student

work.name: Hitachi
work.summary:
Reduced deployment time by 300% through the development of automated configuration scripts. 
 Designed predictive maintenance systems, reducing operational downtime by 20%. 
 Created documentation and training materials for deployment processes.

work.name: Broken Teapot Studios Inc.
work.summary:
Implemented dynamic AI routines for NPCs, improving gameplay fluidity and engagement. 
 Optimized game shader performance by 115% by refactoring code and streamlining resources. 
 Assisted in designing a puzzle mechanic that increased user retention by 25%.

work.name: RTXComputers Electronics Provider
work.summary:
Designed and developed web applications and tools, including a customer support chatbot and product recommendation system. 
 Collaborated with marketing teams to optimize UX and improve conversion rates. 
 Gained hands-on experience with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

work.name: PanQ Game Studio
work.summary:
Founded an indie game studio specializing in innovative mobile games. 
 Designed and developed games, including ”Focus!” and ”Spycer,” which received positive reviews and high user ratings on local app stores. 
 Generated revenue through in-app advertisements.
